column1: Quote
Never give up - Aditya Talekar
Your time is limited
column2: don't waste it living someone else's life - Steve Jobs

column1: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans - John Lennon
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you. - Walt Whitman
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today. - Franklin D. Roosevelt
The best way to predict your future is to create it. - Abraham Lincoln
You must be the change you wish to see in the world. - Mahatma Gandhi
It always seems impossible until it's done. - Nelson Mandela
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it. - Henry David Thoreau
Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going. - Sam Levenson
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. - Eleanor Roosevelt
The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible. - Charles Kingsleigh
The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary. - Vidal Sassoon
Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny. - C.S. Lewis
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great. - John D. Rockefeller
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing. - Walt Disney
You only live once
column2: but if you do it right

column1: I find that the harder I work
column2: the more luck I seem to have. - Thomas Jefferson

column1: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t
column2: you’re right. - Henry Ford

column1: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself. - Jordan Belfort
Opportunities don't happen
column2: you create them. - Chris Grosser

column1: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough. - Og Mandino
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can. - Arthur Ashe
The best revenge is massive success. - Frank Sinatra
Don’t wish it were easier; wish you were better. - Jim Rohn
Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart. - Roy T. Bennett
Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible. - Tony Robbins
Believe in yourself and all that you are. - Christian D. Larson
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does. - William James
Every moment is a fresh beginning. - T.S. Eliot
Turn your wounds into wisdom. - Oprah Winfrey
Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it. - Charles R. Swindoll
Success is not in what you have
column2: but who you are. - Bo Bennett

column1: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated. - Maya Angelou
Perfection is not attainable
column2: but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence. - Vince Lombardi

column1: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
If you want to lift yourself up
column2: lift up someone else. - Booker T. Washington

column1: We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action. - Dr. Henry Link
Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it. - George Bernard Shaw
Dreams don’t work unless you do. - John C. Maxwell
Don’t be afraid to start over. It’s a new chance to rebuild what you want.
If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
Believe you can and you're halfway there. - Theodore Roosevelt
Change the world by being yourself. - Amy Poehler
Every next level of your life will demand a different you.
Don’t stop until you’re proud.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm. - Winston Churchill
The harder you work for something
column2: the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.

column1: Success isn’t about how much money you make; it’s about the difference you make in people’s lives. - Michelle Obama
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined. - Henry David Thoreau
You don’t have to be great to start
column2: but you have to start to be great. - Zig Ziglar

column1: The biggest risk is not taking any risk. - Mark Zuckerberg
I would rather die of passion than of boredom. - Vincent van Gogh
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions. - Dalai Lama
Success is not the absence of failure; it’s the persistence through failure. - Aisha Tyler
A year from now you may wish you had started today. - Karen Lamb
If you can dream it
column2: you can do it. - Walt Disney

column1: It’s never too late to be what you might have been. - George Eliot
Success is a state of mind. If you want success
column2: start thinking of yourself as a success. - Joyce Brothers

column1: The secret of getting ahead is getting started. - Mark Twain
Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today. - Will Rogers
Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
Challenges are what make life interesting; overcoming them is what makes life meaningful. - Joshua J. Marine
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. - C.S. Lewis
Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly. - Robert F. Kennedy
Great things never come from comfort zones.
You don’t need to see the whole staircase
column2: just take the first step. - Martin Luther King Jr.

column1: Success is liking yourself
column2: liking what you do
column3: and liking how you do it. - Maya Angelou

column1: If you can imagine it
column2: you can achieve it; if you can dream it
column3: you can become it. - William Arthur Ward

column1: Aim for the moon. If you miss
column2: you may hit a star. - W. Clement Stone

column1: Be the change you wish to see in the world. - Mahatma Gandhi
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop. - Confucius
Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor. - Truman Capote
Believe in your dreams
column2: no matter how impossible they seem.

column1: Be a voice
column2: not an echo.

column1: Nothing worth having comes easy.
Push yourself
column2: because no one else is going to do it for you.

column1: Strive for progress
column2: not perfection.

column1: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
Don't wait for the perfect moment. Take the moment and make it perfect.
Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
Be so good they can’t ignore you. - Steve Martin
Be yourself; everyone else is already taken. - Oscar Wilde
The only impossible journey is the one you never begin. - Tony Robbins
Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.
Be fearless in the pursuit of what sets your soul on fire.
Work hard in silence
column2: let success be your noise. - Frank Ocean

column1: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take. - Wayne Gretzky
Dream big and dare to fail. - Norman Vaughan
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals. - Zig Ziglar
Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking. - William Butler Yeats
Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do. - John Wooden
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can. - Arthur Ashe
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step. - Lao Tzu
When everything seems to be going against you
column2: remember that the airplane takes off against the wind

column1: Tough times never last
column2: but tough people do. - Robert H. Schuller
